justification: Some nod to B’s buy-low-on-injury tendency by including an injured TE, but it mislabels Justin Wright as high-upside and Josh Robinson as a “stable RB1.” Benefits to both sides are asserted without linking to B’s stated preferences (deep threats, committee backs, urgent wins). The offer is feasible but internally inconsistent with player tiers/roles. Rationale is a one-liner lacking roster/context specifics.
